# 「帅张和他的朋友们」第一期精华电子书

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shuaizhang-he-ta-de-pengyou-men-diyiqi-jinghua-dianzishu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shuaizhang-he-ta-de-pengyou-men-diyiqi-jinghua-dianzishu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shuaizhang-he-ta-de-pengyou-men-diyiqi-jinghua-dianzishu
shuaizhang-he-ta-de-pengyou-men-diyiqi-jinghua-dianzishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shuaizhang-he-ta-de-pengyou-men-diyiqi-jinghua-dianzishu
shuaizhang-he-ta-de-pengyou-men-diyiqi-jinghua-dianzishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
